fields.initialValue: Single Stair North Carolina advocates for building code reforms to enable single-stair residential buildings, creating more affordable, livable, and sustainable housing across our state.
fields.name: description
fields.title: Default SEO Description

fields.initialValue: YOUR VOICE MATTERS. MAKE A DIRECT IMPACT ON SINGLE-STAIR HOUSING POLICY IN NORTH CAROLINA THROUGH TARGETED ADVOCACY.

fields.initialValue: Take Action - Single Stair Housing Advocacy in North Carolina
fields.name: title
fields.title: SEO Title

fields.initialValue: Join the movement for single-stair housing policy reform in North Carolina. Find your representatives, track legislative progress, and get involved in creating better, more affordable housing.
fields.name: description
fields.title: SEO Description

fields.initialValue: WE ARE A COALITION OF ARCHITECTS, PLANNERS, POLICYMAKERS, AND ADVOCATES WORKING TO TRANSFORM NORTH CAROLINA'S HOUSING LANDSCAPE.
fields.name: heroDescription

fields.title: Link

initialValue.title: MORE LIVABLE SPACE
initialValue.description: Single-stair design eliminates redundant corridors, creating 20-30% more usable space.

initialValue.title: BETTER NATURAL LIGHT
initialValue.description: Cross-ventilation and corner units provide superior lighting and air quality.

initialValue.title: REDUCED COSTS
initialValue.description: Simplified construction reduces building costs by 15-25% while maintaining safety.

fields.initialValue: Whether you're an architect, developer, policymaker, or concerned citizen, there's a place for you in our coalition. Together, we can build better communities for all North Carolinians.
fields.name: ctaDescription
fields.title: Call to Action Description
